actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain amounts of retirement benefits from public retirement systems.

summary.text: Excludes from gross income for income tax purposes under the Internal Revenue Code, retirement benefit amounts received from public retirement systems up to $5,000, less any amount received during the taxable year as a monthly benefit under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act. (Amends 26 U.S.C. 124)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain amounts of retirement benefits from public retirement systems.
